mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.laoshi_id as laoshiId ,a.zuoye_name as zuoyeName ,a.zuoye_uuid_number as zuoyeUuidNumber ,a.zuoye_address as zuoyeAddress ,a.zuoye_photo as zuoyePhoto ,a.zuoye_types as zuoyeTypes ,a.zuoye_video as zuoyeVideo ,a.zuoye_file as zuoyeFile ,a.zuoye_content as zuoyeContent ,a.zuoye_delete as zuoyeDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number as laoshiUuidNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,laoshi.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,laoshi.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,laoshi.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,laoshi.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail
FROM zuoye a left JOIN laoshi laoshi ON a.laoshi_id = laoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.laoshi_id = #{params.laoshiId} )
and a.zuoye_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeName},'%')
and a.zuoye_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeUuidNumber},'%')
and a.zuoye_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeAddress},'%')
and a.zuoye_types = #{params.zuoyeTypes}
and a.zuoye_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeVideo},'%')
and a.zuoye_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zuoyeContent},'%')
and a.zuoye_delete >= #{params.zuoyeDeleteStart}
and a.zuoye_delete <= #{params.zuoyeDeleteEnd}
and a.zuoye_delete = #{params.zuoyeDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and a.laoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and laoshi.laoshi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiUuidNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and laoshi.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
